title: I can't open the item shop when i am in a game !!
body:
I was playing a game and I wanted to buy some items and i could not open the item shop !

Please RIOT  help me with my problem !

Thanks..

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  This could be happening for a variety of reasons, but I'm thinking it could be due to a connection problem.  Your network might be having trouble maintaining a constant connection and failing to download or upkeep assets.  Let me know, I'd like to figure this out!
